reviews.review: I've played cs from version 1.5 :) this is next generation which is good :)
Dette spil f√•r dig til at trippe

Ever since counter strike made it out 20 years ago, i got so excited to play it since then, now with csgo in-house game with players internationally playing, well if their ping helps, i feel i went back into my childhood and play it.

I used to find it ridiculous to buy items or skins, but it is cheap to have, fun to have, and to open mysterious chests sometimes a must to have (key).

Overall i recommend this game and look forward to play it and enjoy the fun.
